install_app_desc: Install this app on your device for a better experience.
update_available_description: A new version is available. Reload to update.
if_problem_persists: If the problem persists, try reloading the page or
auth_desc: Sign in to your account to continue
already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign In
magic_link_sent: We sent you a login link. Be sure to check your spam too.
session_expired_description: Your session has expired. You will be logged out automatically.
session_expired_soft_description: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue syncing your data. Your local changes are safe.
offline_no_session_description: Please connect to the internet to sign in. Once signed in, you can use the app offline.
offline_no_session_hint: The app will automatically reconnect when you're back online.
confirm_logout_desc: Are you sure you want to logout? Any pending changes will be synced when you login again.
logout_warning_pending_desc: You have {{count}} unsynced changes. Logging out now will DELETE these changes permanently.
logout_loss_confirmation: I understand that I will lose data
dashboard_empty_subtitle: Start by adding a transaction to see your financial trends!
dashboard_chart_empty_subtitle: There are no transactions for this month.
temporal_trend_desc: Income, expenses, and balance over time
cash_flow_desc: Income vs Expenses comparison by period
top_categories_desc: Top 5 spending categories vs historical average
no_budget_set_hint: Set a monthly budget in Settings to see detailed projections.
recurring_vs_onetime_desc: Split between recurring and occasional transactions
expense_categories_treemap_desc: Hierarchical visualization of expenses by category
yearly_expenses_desc: Monthly expense trends for the current year
yearly_income_desc: Monthly income trends for the current year
yearly_investments_desc: Monthly investment trends for the current year
yearly_cumulative_desc: Monthly cumulative spending comparison by year
category_comparison_desc: How your spending changed vs last period
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
confirm_delete_transaction_description: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
edit_transaction_description: Modify the details of this transaction
no_recurring_transactions: No recurring transactions found. Add one to automate your expenses.
confirm_delete_recurring_description: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring transaction? This action cannot be undone.
name: Name
icons_not_preserved_warning: Warning: {{count}} category(s) could not preserve their icon (default icon assigned).
subcategory_conflict_description: This category has {{count}} subcategories. {{action}} it will make them inaccessible. Do you want to move them to the parent category ({{parentName}})?
confirm_delete_category_description: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This action cannot be undone.
category_has_data_warning: This category is used by {{transactions}} transactions and {{recurring}} recurring templates. Please select a new category to move them to.
category_has_transactions_warning: Warning: This category has {{count}} associated transaction(s). Deleting it will leave these transactions without a category.
group_category_delete_warning: This is a group category. Deleting it will affect all group members.
no_contexts_desc: Create a context to organize your transactions (e.g. 'Holiday', 'Work', 'Renovation')
no_context_data: No context data available. Add contexts to your transactions to see this chart.
confirm_delete_context_description: Are you sure you want to delete this context? Transactions with this context will lose their context association.
groups_desc: Manage shared expense groups and members
add_group_desc: Create a new group to share expenses with others
no_groups_desc: Create a group to start sharing expenses
manage_members_desc: Add or remove members and set their expense shares
user_already_member: This user is already a member
confirm_delete_group_description: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone.
what_to_do_with_transactions: What should happen to existing transactions?
guest_hint: Guests don't need an app account. You manage their expenses.
user_id_share_hint: Share this ID with others to join their expense groups
no_payments_needed: No payments needed! All balances are settled.
payment_marked_paid: This feature will be available soon
settings_calculations_desc: Customize how totals and statistics are calculated.
profile_desc: Manage your profile information and account
profile_update_offline: Profile updated locally, will sync when online
include_investments_desc: If enabled, investment transactions will be added to total expenses.
include_group_expenses_desc: If enabled, group expenses will be included in your personal totals.
monthly_budget_desc: Set a monthly spending limit to track your progress
set_budget_in_settings: Set your monthly budget in Settings
budget_warning_80: You've used {{percentage}}% of your monthly budget. {{remaining}} remaining.
budget_exceeded_notification: Budget exceeded! You're {{amount}} over your monthly limit.
set_budget_description: Set a monthly budget for this category
data_management_desc: Manage your local data and troubleshoot issues
clear_local_cache_desc: Deletes local data only. Remote data on server is not affected.
clear_cache_confirm_desc: This will delete all locally cached data. Your data on the server will NOT be affected. After clearing, data will be re-synced from the server.
import_data_desc: Import transactions and categories from a JSON file
import_success_desc: Your data has been successfully imported into the application.

import.title: Import Data
import.step_select_type: Choose what kind of data you want to import.
import.step_upload: Select the file from your computer.
import.step_mapping: Map columns from your CSV to transaction fields.
import.step_revolut_config: Configure specific options for Revolut import.
import.step_preview: Review the data found in the file.
import.type_backup_desc: Restore from a GoNuts backup or migrate from the old Turtlet app.
import.type_bank_desc: Import transactions from CSV/Excel files (Revolut, Intesa, etc).
import.bank_supported_info: Supported: Revolut, Intesa, N26, and any bank with standard CSV export.
import.bank_supported_desc: Maps Date, Amount, and Description columns manually.
import.select_csv_bank: Select a .csv file from your bank.
import.select_json_backup: Select a .json file to restore your backup.
import.fee_note: Note: Tax will be added to the amount (Amount + Fee).
import.revolut_desc: We detected a Revolut export. Would you like to import transfers to/from your savings accounts and pockets?
import.include_savings_desc: If enabled, transfers to Vaults/Pockets are imported as expenses or income. If disabled, they are ignored to avoid duplicates or noise.
import.migration_mode_desc: We will automatically migrate your categories to the new structure.
import.csv_note_desc: Transactions will be set to 'Uncategorized' initially. Use the rules engine in the next step to categorize them.
import.resolve_conflicts_desc: We found existing data that matches your import.
import.complete_desc: Your data has been successfully imported.
import.orphan_warning_desc: These transactions have missing categories and won't sync until categorized. Use the 'Needs Review' filter to find them.
import.group_warning_desc: This file contains transactions associated with a group. Group associations will be removed and transactions imported as personal expenses.

export_data_desc: Download all your data as a JSON backup file
orphaned_warning: Warning: {{count}} item(s) had missing categories and were moved to 'Uncategorized'.
back_online_description: Your changes are being synced now.
gone_offline_description: Changes will be saved locally and synced when you're back online.
offline_banner_message: Offline - changes will sync when connected
loading_offline_description: You're offline. Loading your locally stored data.
full_sync_hint: Use 'Full Sync' if data seems out of sync after direct database changes.
sync_error_description: Unable to sync data. Changes are saved locally and will be synced when you're back online.

validation.invalid_date: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.invalid_year_month: Year-month must be in YYYY-MM format
validation.amount_finite: Amount must be a finite number
validation.description_max: Description must be less than 500 characters
validation.category_name_max: Category name must be less than 100 characters
validation.group_name_max: Group name must be less than 100 characters
validation.group_description_max: Description must be less than 500 characters
validation.budget_positive: Budget amount must be greater than 0
validation.context_name_max: Context name must be less than 5 characters

welcome.title: Welcome Tour
welcome.description: Get to know the app features
welcome.step_welcome_desc: Your personal finance companion. Track expenses, manage budgets, and achieve your financial goals with ease.
welcome.step_dashboard_desc: Get a quick overview of your finances with interactive charts and real-time balance tracking.
welcome.step_transactions_desc: Easily add income, expenses, and investments. Use the quick-add button for fast entry.
welcome.step_categories_desc: Create hierarchical categories to organize your spending. Parent and child categories for detailed tracking.
welcome.step_contexts_desc: Tag transactions with contexts like Vacation or Work to analyze spending by life events.
welcome.step_groups_desc: Create groups to split expenses with friends or family. See who owes whom at a glance.
welcome.step_statistics_desc: Explore monthly and yearly statistics with beautiful charts and budget tracking.
welcome.step_offline_desc: Use the app even without internet. Your data syncs automatically when you're back online.
